    Impression

    The idea of this project is that we hope users can display themself in another way. Because the current society exists many stereotypes, users can break the established impression. Take advantage of the stamp to reconstruct the face.

    See More
    Lost in Space

    A shooting game that is created by Processing. The game's target is to defeat the alien spaceship in the last stage. The rocket can at most fire five bullets.

    See More
    Bus Tracker

    The bus arrived time information website on the University's App, data from Ministry of Transportation and Communication. The index page shows all the bus stations near the university and the top box can input the bus you want to query.

    See More
    Elevator Simulation

    A multi-thread elevator simulation practice using Python. Besides, a user interface is built by Tkinter.

    Let Tree Grow

    A tree in the website grows or fades according to the intensity of the light from the real world. ( Node.js + NodeMCU + Photoresistor )

    See More
    Courses Search

    Transform the data to fit the Elasticsearch format. Apply Elasticsearch to search, sort, filter, and sum the desired information with name, type, and date.

    Accounting iOS App

    It's an app for iPad. The main function records what goods we have, and who buys the product and also supports the printing function with AirPrint protocol.
